resources.shouldUseViewModelCachingHelpText: Check to enable caching to reduce the data required from the server on subsequent visits to categories that a shopper has already viewed.
resources.showListViewOptionHelpText: Display 'list view' as an option on product pages.
resources.shouldUseScrollableCollectionHelpText: Enable automatic scrolling on lists of products. This removes the need to use pagination controls when scrolling through additional pages.
resources.productsPerPageRequiredHelpText: Enter the set number of products to display per page.
resources.viewModelCacheLimitHelpText: Enter the maximum number of browsed categories to cache. This applies only if the list type is 'product'.
resources.blockSizeRequiredHelpText: Enter the number of products to load per request. The block size setting applies to product listings through category navigation only and not to search results.
resources.listTypeHelpText: Select whether the widget instance is a product listing or search results list type.
resources.shouldUseStyleBasedHelpText: Enable style base listing. This ensures each of the product variants are listed separately.
resources.productListingFieldsRequiredHelpText: Enter a list of fields to be included in the response, separated by commas.
resources.showResultsPerPageOptionHelpText: Enable the number of products displayed on a page to be selected from a list. For example, 12, 24, 48, All.
